summary: Adds 10 new Naruto themed war paints to Skyrim, replacing the vanilla ones.
descriptionHtml:
Naruto War Paint V1

By LETHALrunzXBL

_____________________________

Adds 10 new War Paints to TESV : Skyrim

Replaces vanilla War paint

All files are 1024x1024 .dds files

.rar contains 10 .dds files in the correct folder and most of this description in a .txt file.

_____________________________

: INSTALLATION :
- Extract folder from .rar file
- Place \"Textures\" folder into the C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data
- Let your PC/Mac merge folders and replace files
- Play Skyrim

____________________________

: UNINSTALLATION :
- Delete all \"maleheadwarpaint_##\" .dds files

____________________________

: PERMISSIONS :
- You can use this mod without my permission, as long as you acknowledge me for it.

____________________________

Download, endorse and comment if you like the war paints, if you don\'t, tell me why, how you think I can fix/change it and we\'ll see what happens.

If you want a war paint design made or changed, but don\'t know how, can\'t, or lack the effort to make one, feel free to ask.

____________________________

THE HYUGA CURSE MARK IS NOT THE NAZI SWASTIKA. The Swastika means many things. It was ADOPTED by the Nazi party.

Do some research.
author: LETHALrunzXBL
